Text:
Absolutely brilliant upload mate, thank you so much.
This is a truly mesmerizing game. Truly heart-wrenchingly beautiful...  Love it so much.

Thanks bro.  Just saw a preview and detailed info on the game on Game Informer which states the game has one of the deepest stories ever created within a game.

So thanks!

Hey guys, I'm having a little issue. It could be my computer (wouldn't doubt it actually) but I thought I'd check to see if anyone else is having the same issue. After I talk to the caretaker and choose to put the equipment down, the game crashes and my whole comp reboots. Any suggestions?

Artemis trojan found by AVG.
On the other hand, the game works fine!
Oh and I doubt this one is a false positive, you should google it.
have i lost the plot????? i don't get what you're all talking about. graphics are like 1985 nintendo. did not like at all, deleated!!!!!!!
TROJAN! Game works, but it's infected!

I didn't get any Trojan and I use AVG so I guess it's safe.

But I keep getting the same error :( the game won't start. It just crashes and says it has found an error and has to shut down. Does anyone have some helpful advice? 

Thanks in advance.
And problem solved! Turns out all I needed to do was create an exception on the DEP settings. If anyone else experiences this program just follow this guide http://www.itechtalk.com/thread3591.html
